sentences.en: Regan MacNeil : How do you mean?
sentences.cn: 瑞根: 你是什么意思?

sentences.en: Regan MacNeil : I was possessed by a demon. It's OK. He's gone.
sentences.cn: 瑞根: 我刚被魔鬼附体, 现在好了, 他走了.

sentences.en: She also says that on one occasion, Regan hung up on her in the middle of a phone conversation.
sentences.cn: 她还表示，有一次，在电话交谈中，里根挂了她的电话。

sentences.en: This guy Regan could sit out this guy Reagan.
sentences.cn: 这个里甘一直不理睬里根.
